Package it.polimi.ingsw.network.messages

  • Interface Summary
    Interface Description
    ExecutableMessage  
    ExecutableViewMessage  
  • Class Summary
    Class Description
    CommunicationMex
    This class represents a generic error message.
    DecksUpdateMessage
    This class notifies the client that the FaithPath has changed its state.
    DiscardResourceMessage
    A client sends this message if it wants to discard a resource.
    EndTurnMessage
    Message that signals the end of a turn.
    ErrorMessage
    This class represents a generic error message.
    FaithPathUpdateMessage
    This class notifies the client that the FaithPath has changed its state.
    FirstActionMessage
    This message is sent during the setup turn in order to discard 2 leader cards.
    GetProductionCardMessage
    Message sent in order to put a DevelopmentCard in the PlayerBoard reserved space.
    HumanPlayerUpdateMessage
    This message is sent every time the player changes its state.
    LeaderMessage
    This message is sent in order to play or discard a LeaderCard
    LobbyJoinMessage  
    LobbyMessage  
    LobbySetMessage  
    LoginMessage  
    MarketReplyMessage
    Message sent by the server with the resulting array of resources.
    MarketRequestMessage
    Message sent by the client in order to initiate a Market action.
    MarketUpdateMessage
    This message is sent to all users every time the market is modified.
    Message
    Generic message class.
    Ping  
    ProductionMessage  
    SecondActionMessage
    This message is sent in order to choose the starting resources for your game.
    SetResourceMessage
    Message that the client sends when it decides to put a resource into a specific row.
    ShiftWarehouseMessage
    Message that the client sends in order to shift rows in the Warehouse
    StateMessage  
    UseProductionBaseMessage
    This class is sent by the client in order to activate the PlayerBoard base production.
    UseProductionNormalMessage
    This class is sent by the client in order to activate Development Card driven production.
    UseProductionSpecialMessage
    This class is sent by the client in order to activate Leader Card special production.
  • Enum Summary
    Enum Description
    MessageType
    Enum with all possible message types.
